CLIs: sessions [ nat-group <nat-group-id> ] [ mda <mda-id> ] [ protocol { gre | icmp | icmp6 | tcp | udp | unknown } ] [ inside-ip <ip-prefix> [ </ip-prefix-length> ] ] [ inside-router <router-instance> ] [ inside-port <port-number> ] [ outside-ip <ipv4-address> ] [ outside-port <port-number> ] [ foreign-ip <ip-address> ] [ foreign-port <port-number> ] [ dslite-address <ipv6-address> ] [ wlan-gw-ue <ieee-address> ] [ next-index <index> ] [ upnp ] [ member <member-id> ] [ nat-policy <policy-name> ] [ dest-ip <ip-address> ] [ firewall-policy <policy-name> ] [ address-type <addr-type> ] [ l2-aware-subscriber <sub-ident> ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies to dump only ICMP information.
Specifies a MAC address, using the format xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx or xx-xx-xx-xx-xx-xx.
Specifies an IPv4 or IPv6 address. Values-ipv4-address - a.b.c.d.
Specifies an IPv6 address. Values-x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x (eight 16-bit pieces).
Specifies a NAT group ID. Values-1 to 4.
Specifies a policy name, up to 32 characters maximum.
Specifies a port number. Values-0 to 65535.
Specifies a router name or service ID.
Specifies to dump only TCP information.
Specifies to dump only UDP information.
Specifies to dump only UPNP information.
